com.adidas.ui.validator

Class ValidateLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • CoreValidateLogic
      • com.adidas.ui.validator.ValidateLogic
  • Deprecated. 
    use Validation with ValidationVisualizer

    public class ValidateLogic
extends CoreValidateLogic
    This is a main class for validation logic. Holds a list of validation which are being performed one after another. Result on failure will be returned from first failed validation. The rest of validations will be skipped.
